name: Trouble on the Corner of Sugar & Spice
name_original: Trouble on the Corner of Sugar & Spice
description:
Originally created in 10 days for Art Fight 2020: Sugar vs. Spice, Trouble on the Corner of Sugar & Spice  is a mass attack project that's since been polished up into a playable demo.

What does any of that mean? Well, to make a long story short I asked a bunch of people on the Discord server to loan me their OCs, and then I crammed them all into a single project. Toss in some server in-jokes here and some public-domain music there, and you've got a crossover game between more than twenty different narratives.

If that sounds overwhelming - don't stress! You don't need any prior knowledge of Art Fight or its competitors to understand this game.

-------------

Features:

  • Point-and-click action: explore Sugar Street, gossip with locals, and uncover the history of Circadian City's odd, odd rivalries.
  • Pick a side: break stuff with Team Sugar, or shake down kidnapping suspects with Team Spice. Laws will be broken either way!
  • Tons of characters to find: Twelve locals to meet and bother and countless more to find in cameos, generously submitted by a range of Art Fight members.
  • Like maybe two in-jokes: Are the other jokes any funny? Who knows! But zero knowledge of Art Fight is required to understand the game.
  • Teen rating. Contains some crude jokes, slapstick violence, and swearing.

-------------

Disclaimer:

This game was not made by a member of Art Fight staff and should in no way be considered "official". The game's visual assets were created as a mass attack submission by Falsely.

If you like what you see here, please consider checking out the works of the character designers listed below.
